GeDBIT.index

接口 Query

  • 所有已知实现类:
    KNearestNeighborQuery, KNNQuery, RangeQuery

    public interface Query
    Base interface for queries, consisting of all the information necessary to search the database.
    版本:
    2006.05.09
    作者:
    Rui Mao, Willard
